long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Created by: Hunter Ahlquist, Jean-Kenneth Antonio, Eashune Abenojar, and Zahrah Alsamach 

WORKS WITH ZOOM PREMIUM ACCOUNTS ONLY

Don't remember who was in your ZOOM call last? Use this tool to keep track of who attended!
The extension will remember users, so if someone logs in with the same name but no email, generated attendance list will default to the last known email they used.

While intended for educational instructors, it could be used for any reoccurring ZOOM meeting that needs to have attendance tracked.

All data is stored locally and is FERPA compliant.

Source-code: https://github.com/HunterAhlquist/ZOOM-Canvas-Attendance-Tool
